original_text: Those who brought gifts of silver or bronze offered them to the Lord. Everyone who had acacia wood brought it to help with the Lord's work. Those who brought gifts of silver or bronze offered them to the Lord. Everyone who had acacia wood brought it to help with the Lord's work. Those who brought gifts of silver or bronze offered them to the Lord. Everyone who had acacia wood brought it to help with the Lord's work.
korean_text: 은과 놋으로 예물을 삼는 모든 자가 가져다가 여호와께 드렸으며 섬기는 일에 소용되는 조각목이 있는 모든 자는 가져왔으며

sentences.original_text: Those who brought gifts of silver
or bronze offered them to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 청동으로 예물을 가져온 사람들은 그것들을 주께 바쳤다

sentences.original_text: brought it to help with the Lord's work
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 일을 돕기 위해 그것을 가져왔다
